entry.string: There is an error in the username
There is a space in the username
That email address is already registered.
entry.translation: email 地址已經被用來註冊.

entry.string: There is an error in the email address
The two password entries are not the same
Write this string in the message body or subject to display the corresponding information
This email will be sent to users to complete their registration by a link in the email
entry.translation: 這封 email 會寄給使用者來藉由郵件中的鏈結來完成註冊

entry.string: This email will be sent to users to welcome them
entry.translation: 這封 email 會寄給使用者來歡迎他們

entry.string: This email will be sent to users who use the lost password option
entry.translation: 這封 email 會寄給遺失密碼的使用者

entry.string: This email will be sent to users when their accounts are pending approval
This email will be sent to users when their accounts are deactivated
entry.translation: 這封 email 會寄給帳號未啟用的使用者

entry.string: The following variables will be replaced in the text with specific information

entry.translation: 這個使用者的 IP 位址
管理員的 email 地址
這個使用者的使用者名稱
這個使用者的 email 地址

entry.string: Send mail to groups, configure automatic notification or edit notification templates
Search for users with either their real name, login name or email matching the string
entry.translation: 利用符合這個字串的真實姓名、登入名稱或 email 來搜尋使用者
寄送歡迎 email 出錯

entry.string: A new user has registered. Here are the details
entry.translation: 一個新使用者已經註冊. 這裡為細節
一個新使用者已經註冊

entry.string: That email address is either reserved or not allowed on this website
entry.translation: 這個 email 地址不是被保留就是在這網站不被允許

entry.string: Your password must be #(1) characters long.
entry.translation: 你的密碼必須是 #(1) 字母長
